verses.verse: But in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%> above the <S%H1389>hills;<s%> and <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5102>flow<s%> to it.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1980>come,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and he will <S%H3384>teach<s%> us of his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H734>paths:<s%> for the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off; and they shall <S%H3807>beat<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> into <S%H855>plowshares,<s%> and their <S%H2595>spears<s%> into pruning <S%H4211>hooks:<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

But they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree; and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid:<s%> for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H430>god,<s%> and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will I <S%H622>assemble<s%> her that <S%H6761>halts,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> her that is <S%H5080>driven<s%> out, and her that I have <S%H7489>afflicted;<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> her that <S%H6761>halted<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant,<s%> and her that was <S%H1972>cast<s%> far off a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> from now <S%H6258>on,<s%> even for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And you, O <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H5739>flock,<s%> the <S%H6076>strong<s%> <S%H6076>hold<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> to you shall it <S%H857>come,<s%> even the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4475>dominion;<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> do you <S%H7321>cry<s%> out <S%H7452>aloud?<s%> is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in you? is your <S%H3289>counselor<s%> <S%H6>perished?<s%> for <S%H2427>pangs<s%> have <S%H2388>taken<s%> you as a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>

Be in <S%H2342>pain,<s%> and <S%H1518>labor<s%> to <S%H1518>bring<s%> <S%H1518>forth,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> like a woman in <S%H3205>travail:<s%> for <S%H6258>now<s%> shall you <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> and you shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and you shall <S%H935>go<s%> even to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> there shall you be <S%H5337>delivered;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> also <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, that <S%H559>say,<s%> Let her be <S%H2610>defiled,<s%> and let our <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> on <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

But they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> they his <S%H6098>counsel:<s%> for he shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> them as the <S%H5995>sheaves<s%> into the <S%H1637>floor.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H1758>thresh,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> <S%H5154>brass:<s%> and you shall <S%H1854>beat<s%> in pieces <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will <S%H2763>consecrate<s%> their <S%H1214>gain<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H2428>substance<s%> to the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
